message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the financial statements.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Cost of Goods Sold" represents the value of inventory that was sold during the period. This is the standard accounting line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories that have been sold.

From the income statement section:
```
| Cost of Goods Sold | 353220.00 | 2024-02-05 |
```

The value of the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 353220.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '353220.00'} }
```
